contents.title: All features
contents.description: Discover all the features of Bloggrify.

children.value: Bloggrify is built on top of
blog generator that uses markdown files to generate blog posts.

A static blog generator is a tool that generates a blog from markdown files. It is a great way to create a blog because it is simple, fast, and secure. It requires no database and no server-side code. It is just a bunch of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files.
because there is no server-side code that can be hacked.
because there is no database to query and no server-side code to execute.
because it is just a bunch of files.
because it can be hosted on a static hosting provider.
The global configuration of the blog is done in the nuxt.config.ts file.
You can read the content of runtimeConfig.public in the nuxt.config.ts file to see the configuration of the blog.
the social networks (twitter, mastodon, youtube, linkedin, facebook, instagram, github) for the website
Read the actual nuxt.config.ts file to see the configuration of the blog.
You can use all standard markdown features plus some extra features such as frontmatter to add metadata to your markdown files.
You can read more about it
Bloggrify is SEO friendly. It generates a sitemap and a RSS feed. It also supports Open Graph and Twitter cards. It has been optimized for search engines.
The content you'll write on your blog will be in the language you choose. It's important for bots to set up the right language in the html attribute of the
This blog generates automatically a sitemap.xml and a RSS feed (rss.xml).
All content is automatically added to the sitemap and the RSS feed except the content with the
composables to add metadata to the head of the pages.

All pages have a default title and description.
You can tweak the image, title and description of each page in the frontmatter of the markdown file.
This is highly recommended to do so to have a good SEO, not even mentioning that your blog will look broken if you don't define title for each page...

You can add a newsletter to your blog to keep your readers updated when you publish new content.

The tricky part here is that this blog is a static site, so you can't use a traditional newsletter service, or you'll have to manually send out emails every time you publish a new post and that's not very practical.

Instead, you can use a RSS-to-email service to create a newsletter and then add a form to your blog to allow your readers to sign up.

Nuxt Studio, git tabanl bir cms sunuyor. Markdown dosyalarnz panelden dzenleyebiliyorsunuz, yaptnz deiiklikler git hesabnzdan commit atlyor. Hazr gelen yaygnlatrma scripti var, siz deploy butonuna tkladnzda siteniz otomatik yaynlanyor.

oluturduktan sonra bilgisayarmda oluturduum klasrde u komutlar altrdm:
git init
git add .
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin

u komutu yazdktan sonra hata zld, push ilemini tekrar yaptm:

Wordpress'te simply statik eklentisini kuruyoruz. Eklentinin Settings -> Deployment sayfasnda Deployment Method olarak Local Directory seiyoruz. PATH olarak /var/www/static/ girdim.
Bulunduumuz domainle ayn yerde yaynlamayacamz iin Replacing URLs ayarlarnda Relative Paths seip / deerini giriyoruz.
Advanced ayarlar sayfasnda da Force URL Replacements seeneini aktifletiriyoruz.
Benim DNS ayarlarm CloudFlare'de. Sitemi Proxied seeneini kapatp sadece DNS kayd olarak tutuyorum. certbot ile sunucuda SSL ayarlyorum.

Sunucuda dizini oluturup eklentide Generate Static Files butonuna basarak ilemi balatyoruz.
Debugging Mode ayar var, onu aktifletirebiliriz. Activity Log sayfasndan ilemi takip edebiliyoruz.

Sunucuda /var/www/static/ dizinini GitHub'da bir repo aarak oraya yklyoruz.
Deploy keys ile yapmak iin:
How to Use GitHub Deploy Keys (dylancastillo.co)
lk sefer dnda buraya girmeye gerek kalmasn diye gncellemeleri push'layan bir bash script'i root hesabndayken crontab'a ekliyorum.

props.code: * * * * * [ $(find /var/www/ufkayolculuk_wp/index.html -type f | wc -l) -gt 0 ];then /var/www/static.sh && cd /var/www/static && git add . && git commit -m "Automatic Commit" && git push; fi

Bataki if komutunu bir ka denemeden sonra farkederek ekledim. Statik dosyalarn generate ilemi srasnda index.html olmad iin bu sorgu sayesinde o ilemin bitmesini beklemi oluyorum.
GitHub deploy keys kullanmazsam Git ilemleri yaplabilmesi iin u komutu kullanp bir defa manuel git commit ve push ilemini yapyorum
CloudFlare Pages'ta yeni bir kayt oluturuyoruz, GitHub'daki repomuza balyoruz. Statik dosyalar olduu iin build ayarlarnda deiiklik yapmadan yayna alyoruz.
Artk GitHub'da her deiiklikte sitemiz gncellenicek. Ayrca CloudFlare Pages'taki pages.dev uzantl adresi Custom Domains sayfasndan kendi alan adnza balayabiliyorsunuz.
